## CharityORG.recruitVolunteer() method

Recruit a new charity volunteer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
recruitVolunteer(name: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of volunteer to recruit. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the volunteer was successfully recruited, false otherwise.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 2 GB

Attempt to recruit a new charity volunteer.

Possible reasons for failure: \* Cannot currently recruit a new volunteer \* There already exists a volunteer with the specified name
